verses.verse: Then I turned <WH7725>, and lifted up <WH5375> my eyes <WH5869>, and looked <WH7200>, and behold a flying <WH5774> roll <WH4039>.

And he said <WH559> unto me <WH7200>, What see you <WH559>? And I answered, I see <WH7200> a flying <WH5774> roll <WH4039>; the length <WH753> there is twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> there ten <WH6235> cubits <WH520>.

Then said <WH559> he unto me <WH423>, This is the curse that goes forth <WH3318> over the face <WH6440> of the whole earth <WH776>: for every one that steals <WH1589> shall be cut off <WH5352> as on this side according <WH3644> to it <WH7650>; and every one that swears shall be cut off <WH5352> as on that side according to it <WH3644>.

I will bring it forth <WH3318>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, and it shall enter <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of the thief <WH1590>, and into the house <WH1004> of him that swears <WH7650> falsely <WH8267> by my name <WH8034>: and it shall remain <WH3885> in the midst <WH8432> of his house <WH1004>, and shall consume <WH3615> it with the timber <WH6086> there and the stones there <WH68>.
Then the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me went forth <WH3318>, and said <WH559> unto me <WH5375>, Lift up now your eyes <WH5869>, and see <WH7200> what is this that goes forth <WH3318>.
And I said <WH559>, What is it <WH559>? And he said, This is a ephah <WH374> that goes forth <WH3318>. He said <WH559> moreover <WH5869>, This is their resemblance through all the earth <WH776>.
And <WH5375>, behold, there was lifted up a talent <WH3603> of lead <WH5777>: and this is a <WH259> woman <WH802> that sits <WH3427> in the midst <WH8432> of the ephah <WH374>.

And he said <WH559>, This is wickedness <WH7564>. And he cast <WH7993> it into the midst <WH8432> of the ephah <WH374>; and he cast <WH7993> the weight <WH68> of lead <WH5777> upon the mouth there <WH6310>.

Then lifted I up <WH5375> my eyes <WH5869>, and looked <WH7200>, and <WH3318>, behold, there came out two <WH8147> women <WH802>, and the wind <WH7307> was in their wings <WH3671>; for they had <WH2007> wings <WH3671> like the wings <WH3671> of a stork <WH2624>: and they lifted up <WH5375> the ephah <WH374> between the earth <WH776> and the heaven <WH8064>.
Then said <WH559> I to the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me <WH3212>, Where do these bear the ephah <WH374>?
And he said <WH559> unto me <WH1129>, To build it a house <WH1004> in the land <WH776> of Shinar <WH8152>: and it shall be established <WH3559>, and set <WH3240> there upon her own base <WH4369>.
